post.author: 구게시판
post.content:
Hi Everyone;

  If you do a search using a search key 'MVS' and 'ontario' in '411jobs.ca',

  the result will include a posting by OAOT.

  I worked there for a while last year and still keep in touch with HR staffs.

  When I applied through On-line (Internet) about three times, there was no response at all.

  However, I was invited to a job interview immediately when my resume was delivered to them in person.

  Therefore, if you intend to apply, please forward your resume to me so that potentially

  it will get more attentions if I deliver it.

  Let me remind you that it does NOT guarantee anything .

  No matter what, they will still do a screening first to evaluate the qualification

  before contacting any potential candidates.
  

  Again, forward your resume to 'stevenkim@home.com'. (also if you have any questions.)

  Thanks.

  Steven Kim
post.title: [2001/06/08] If you intend to apply OAO TechnologyT... (작성자: COSKA)
